customCommands.name: generate_api_endpoint
customCommands.description: Generate a new API endpoint with FastAPI
customCommands.prompt: Create a FastAPI endpoint for {endpoint_name} with proper error handling and documentation. Include request/response models if needed.

customCommands.name: generate_react_component
customCommands.description: Generate a new React component with Ant Design
customCommands.prompt: Create a React component using Ant Design for {component_name}. Include proper state management and styling.

customCommands.name: generate_database_model
customCommands.description: Generate a database model for SQLAlchemy
customCommands.prompt: Create a SQLAlchemy model for {model_name} with proper relationships and constraints. Include __tablename__, columns, and relationships.

customCommands.name: generate_test_case
customCommands.description: Generate a test case for Pytest
customCommands.prompt: Create a Pytest test case for {function_name} that covers normal operation, edge cases, and error conditions.

codeTemplates.sqlalchemy_model:
from sqlalchemy import Column, Integer, String
from database import Base

class {model_name}(Base):
    __tablename__ = '{table_name}'
    
    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True)
    name = Column(String(50))
